sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' export default function CartItem({id,name,image,company,price,amount,stock}) { const [quantity,setQuantity] = useState(amount); const setDecrease = ()=>{ quantity > 1?setQuantity(quantity-1):setQuantity(1); } const setIncrease = ()=>{ quantity>=stock?setQuantity(stock):setQuantity(quantity+1); } return (
-{quantity}+

{name}

{company}

{new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'INR' }).format( price, )}

Total Count of Items:

{quantity}
Shipping cost:

Free
Total net amount:

{new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'INR', maximumSignificantDigits: 3 }).format( quantity*price, )}
) }
